snippet: Ivan Puhich, 85, has been developing riders since 1944. His first involvement with a Triple Crown-winning horse, Citation, came four years later.
abstract: Profile of Ivan Puhich, a storied jockey's agent who has been developing riders since 1944; Puhich is coming to New York to watch his latest discovery Mario Gutierrez ride Triple Crown contender I'll Have Another in a bid for history in the 144th running of the Belmont Stakes.
lead_paragraph: Ivan Puhich, 85, has been developing riders since 1944. His first involvement with a Triple Crown-winning horse, Citation, came four years later.

headline.seo: Belmont Stakes — Agent Saw Promise in I’ll Have Another’s Jockey
headline.main: Veteran Agent Saw Promise in I’ll Have Another’s Jockey
headline.print_headline: Veteran Agent Saw Promise In I’ll Have Another’s Jockey
